item.title: Ingrid is selling gorditas, chile relleno, and chocoflan next...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Ingrid is selling gorditas, chile relleno, and chocoflan next week to raise money to pay for legal costs associated with her immigration case. Ingrid has been in sanctuary in Boulder for almost four years now‚Äîlonger than her daughter has been alive. You can support her by buying food next weekend. (and share this post if that‚Äôs not an option!) tinyurl.com/solidarity-meals-10-24
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

Sanctuary4All ColoradoDenver Public Schools

Continuing with our celebration of Hispanic Heritage Month, Luna Baez-Vizguerra, an 11th-grade student at Kunsmiller Creative Arts Academy shares how her mother is her cultural hero. Luna writes, ‚Äúmy mom is seen as a symbol of hope for the immigrant community.‚Äù Read more ‚û°Ô∏è bit.ly/30kTs4Z

Individuals, organizations and elected officials: Tell Biden to free families in Sanctuary. Please Sign!
Friends, we are asking Vice President Joe Biden to commit to liberating people currently living in Sanctuary if elected president this November. Please join us in fighting for Sanctuary Leaders and the communities they represent.
Individuals Sign here: https://actionnetwork.org/‚Ä¶/ask-joe-biden-to-commit-to-fre‚Ä¶/...

item.title: https://www.facebook.com/244429502833301/posts/459029841373265/
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

https://www.facebook.com/244429502833301/posts/459029841373265/

Abolish ICE Denver

URGENT ALERT (English translation follows)

Alerta familias del Distrito de DPS tenemos informaci√≥n de que ICE est√° utilizando nuevas t√°cticas haciendo llamadas... haci√©ndose pasar por maestros pidiendo su informaci√≥n para el programa de visitas en casa por favor de no dar ning√∫n tipo de informaci√≥n verifiquen en la escuela de sus hijos si saben de alguna familia que les han echo estas llamadas haci√©ndose pasar por los maestros de sus hijos d√©jenos saber o si alguien a sido detenido bajo este enga√±√≥ cont√°cteme para proveer apoyo tel√©fono #720 329 06 57 esta informaci√≥n a sido confirmada por Susana Cordova Superintendents de DPS y nuestra responsabilidad es prevenir a nuestras comunidades y familias . Recuerden tener el n√∫mero de respuesta r√°pida en caso de interacci√≥n con ICE es el #1844 864 83 41 opci√≥n #1 para redadas daremos seguimiento a esto y no compartan informaci√≥n sin verificar con los maestros de sus hijos y la escuela

________________________________

ALERT: Families of Denver Public School district:
We have information that ICE is using new tactics: making calls posing as teachers asking for their information for the home visits program. Please do not give any type of information! Check with your children's school!

If you know of any family who have received these calls from people posing as the teachers of their children, let us know; or if someone has been arrested under this deception contact Jeanette Vizguerra! This information has been confirmed by Susana Cordova, Superintendent of DPS.

Our responsibility is to protect our communities and families. Remember to have the quick response number in case of interaction with ICE: (844) 864-8341 option #1 for raids
